comment.text: RUDY chief of staff !! Trey Gowdy attorney general Jason Chaffetz Secretary of State , colonel Allen b West head of military .. dr Ben Carson surgeon general ..

replies.text: I still laugh when I think of Megyn Kelly trying to get one over on Newt Gingrich. He took her down and Trey Goody is a must.
